a.title: Go to University Prep Public Schools

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

img.title: apart, but not alone
img.br: In response to COVID-19, University Prep has suspended all on-site classes for all grades until further notice. Click below for more resources and information about our distance learning program.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; font-family: latobold; color: rgb(0, 176, 80);

span.strong: Distance learning student and family resources

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; font-family: latobold; color: rgb(0, 176, 80);

span.br:
Ask questions, talk to school leaders, suggest ideas, get support and help others: Click below to join our Weekly Family CheckUP
​UP MIDDLE: Wednesdays at 6pmUP High: Wednesdays at 5pm​

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; font-family: latobold; color: rgb(0, 176, 80);
letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; font-family: latobold; color: rgb(0, 176, 80);

div.blockquote: Welcome to University Prep Charter High School's website! We hope that you find it easy to use and full of helpful information and resources. If you have any feedback or suggestions for other information you'd like to see on our website, please do not hesitate to contact us. Don't forget to check back often for updates and announcements. Happy browsing!Ms. d'Amato
